parameters: I have no reason to go in here.
\n<Tobi>Yeah it is! It's "in the commercial landscape with additional material and polish"!!!
\n<Matsuki>Tobi??? You're being unrealistic again are you ok??
\n<Matsuki>(Thank the Gods)Of course Tobi, I'll get you some later!
\n<Matsuki>Ok so I can train more to be a warrior with Genko, cook with mother, study with father, weave with Menke, or forge with Tolkien.
\n<Matsuki>I should probably also make the effort to talk to the masters at least once a day. It never hurts to "gain favor" as father says.
Your Quest Journal has been updated!
\n<Matsuki>Hey Jet! What has you looking so down?
\n<Jet>I've been looking for Sara's doll all day and I still can't find it. Could you help me?
\n<Sara>Jet lost my Goblino!!!! He's probably all alone and scared and I can't find him!!
\n<Matsuki>I'll talk to him! Maybe I can find your toy for you.
\n<Matsuki>(Ok remember don't be weird its just Shiori, we've been friends forever!!)
\n<Shiori>Its a Lilacious Flower, almost as pretty as you.
\n<Shiori>Hahaha. You want to know a secret Matsuki? I’m a bit jealous that you’re older than me, you get to become an adult sooner. You get to be the first to declare what you want.
\n<Matsuki>(Her flirting will be the death of me). It’s not a big deal.. I’m jealous of you Shiori, already knowing what to do.
\n<Shiori>I’m just going to make a small flower shop, you could be anything! I think you should be proud of that, I already am!
What if I built the Flower shop with you?
I just want to stay with you
That's like saying I could be nothing..
What if I built the Flower shop with you?
\n<Shiori>haha! That’s really sweet of you Matsu! But like grandmother says we each have our own destiny! She said you’ll excel in what you choose to do, and I can’t have you taking over my shop!!!
\n<Shiori>And I won’t let you settle for something you don’t love. You’re too wonderful for that, you deserve something you choose.
I just want to stay with you
\n<Shiori>Oh Matsuki! I want to stay with you too!! You’ve always been my best friend. I know we’ll always be together!
\n<Matsuki>(but will we be in the way that I wish..)
That's like saying I could be nothing..
\n<Shiori>None of that Matsu!! I won’t have the woman who saved me talk that way about herself!!! You’re going to be awesome and that is that!
\n<Matsuki>Ah I'm sorry you're right, you always are. (I'm so damn whipped)
\n<Matsuki> (I don't have anything good enough to give Shiori!!!)
\n<Shiori>Well aren't you forward this morning! Are you that desperate to get out of apprenticing this afternoon?
\n<Shiori>That was a sweet attempt though, maybe court me for a few days, Romeo. You can have a response then~

Wish's Silks (So wonderful only a wish could make them!)
\n<Genko>Hm, alright soldier it’s almost time for you to choose isn’t it? You better hurry up and make up your mind.

\n<Genko>Now I understand young people like to “save the best for last”, but holding things off can mean you never get to experience the best, should something happen. Stop dallying and train with me!
\n<Genko>...I still believe the Humans will attack one day. All they know how to do is destroy.

\n<Genko>Now I understand young people like to “save the best for last”, but holding things off can mean you never get to experience the best, should something happen. Stop dallying and train with me!
\n<Matsuki>I don't have \c[2]Bait\c[0]! I should go ask \c[4]Mom\c[0].
\n<Matsuki>I don't have a \c[2]fishing pole\c[0]! I should go ask \c[4]Mom\c[0].
\n<Jet>Father warned me I can get lost in here, but it’s so small!!!
\n<Jet>I wonder what the fancy rock is..?
\n<Matsuki>That's where I mine Jet! I use the ore for forging with Tolkien!
\n<Matsuki>(I wonder..Maybe I should apprentice with \c[2]Tolkien\c[0] to find out.

\n<Suki>I made an extra pie each for you and your brother! It’s still warm so eat it soon!
\n<Suki>I made an extra pie each for you and your brother! It’s still warm so eat it soon!
\n<Suki>Don't let your brother talk you into more pie, ok? That boy has more thanenough.
\n<Suki>Don't let your brother talk you into more pie, ok? That boy has more thanenough.
\n<Lieza>You look a bit unraveled today Matsuki, are you feeling alright?!
\n<Lieza>You look a bit tired, Your parents and the other masters aren't working you too hard are they?
\n<Matsuki>Ah no..they're really just pushing me to make a decision soon.
\n<Lieza>Well if you ask my opinion, I think you're better off keeping any choices you have/will make under wraps. It's your decision after all.
\n<Matsuki>You made a good pun this time!!
\n<Lieza>Always happy to see you appreciate-WHAT DO YOU MEAN "THIS TIME"??
\n<Lieza>You look a bit tired, Your parents and the other masters aren't working you too hard are they?
\n<Matsuki>Ah no..they're really just pushing me to make a decision soon.
\n<Lieza>Well if you ask my opinion, I think you're better off keeping any choices you have/will make under wraps. It's your decision after all.
\n<Matsuki>You made a good pun this time!!
\n<Lieza>Always happy to see you appreciate-WHAT DO YOU MEAN "THIS TIME"??
\n<Lieza>Well I'm just going to "walk like an egyptian" away since you think my puns are so bad!!
\n<Matsuki>(That one was a stretch and she knows it)
\n<Lieza>Well I'm just going to "walk like an egyptian" away since you think my puns are so bad!!
\n<Matsuki>(That one was a stretch and she knows it)
\n<Lieza>Ah I'm afraid I relaxed too much yesterday, I was starting to unwind!!
\n<Lieza>Today’s going to be a great day Matsuki! I can feel it in my bones!! Deeep deeeep in my bones,covered by wrappings, because I’m a mummy!!!
\n<Matsuki>haha I get it Lieza, that one was a bit flat though.
\n<Lieza>Ahhh Grandmother Shienna of the Skies didn’t bless me with good jokes I’m afraid.
\n<Lieza>Today’s going to be a great day Matsuki! I can feel it in my bones!! Deeep deeeep in my bones,covered by wrappings, because I’m a mummy!!!
\n<Matsuki>haha I get it Lieza, that one was a bit flat though.
\n<Lieza>Ahhh Grandmother Shienna of the Skies didn’t bless me with good jokes I’m afraid.
\n<Lieza>I recently looked up even more puns so just you wait, more are coming. Then it'll be crying home to mummy for you!
\n<Lieza>I recently looked up even more puns so just you wait, more are coming. Then it'll be crying home to mummy for you!
\n<Tobi>I want to catch a fishey for mommy!
\n<Matsuki>Yeah? You want to learn to fish Tobi?
\n<Matsuki>Alright little buddy just watch your big sister! First you get out your fishing pole, put on some bait, sink your line and-
\n<Tobi>Thank you Matsu!!! Here! I trade!! Give this to Shi-chan!!
\n<Tobi>Pretty rock for Shi-chan!! Thank you Matsu!!
\n<Matsuki>(I don't know how to fish!!!! He looks so excited though!! I can't let him down!! I'll just do this like our ancestors did!)
\n<Matsuki>Alright Tobi all you have to do is wait for a fish to come by, get your paw ready and-
\n<Matsuki>Haha maybe go to mom and ask her what fish she likes first Tobi. (ugh thats so embarrassing!!)
\n<Matsuki>Don't you have a lot of energy today!!
\n<Matsuki>?? Where do I find you one of those??
\n<Matsuki>Buddy there’s no stores here… how about this, you want some pie??? Where do I find you one of those??
\n<Matsuki>(Thank the Gods I got the little sucker, the cookies are MINE)
\n<Jet>Matsu!! Daddy says you might come work at the shop one day!! Is that true?
\n<Jet>If you do does that mean you can live with us? I can share my room and Sara can share her Goblino!
\n<Jet>YES!!!! Then you can be my real big sister!!! We can make clothes together and you can show me how to sew flowers into them!!
\n<Jet>Sara likes flowers! I’ll make her a shirt for her own day of choosing, and my new big sister can help me!!!
\n<Sara>If you work for daddy can you make me adventure clothes??
\n<Matsuki>Why those? You have such pretty dresses.
\n<Sara>I don’t want dresses!! I want to fight humans with pants!!!
\n<Matsuki>hahaha not with a sword, but pants?
\n<Matsuki>Oh? How many swords are we talking?
\n<Matsuki>Woah, those humans will be afraid to fight you Sara!
\n<Sara>I know! My pants will be really scary!!
\n<Sara>I want pants with swords built in!! Those humans will quiver before me!!
\n<Matsuki>Just walking around, doing what I need to.
\n<Sara>Well what do you need to do?
\n<Matsuki>Say hi to everyone in town, apprentice for the day, that sort of thing.
\n<Matsuki>Well I think it’s all going to help me choose what I want to be.
\n<Matsuki>Well when your an adult you have to choose some sort of craft so you can be beneficial to society.
\n<Menke>Do you know why I stopped living in a lamp?
\n<Matsuki>Because 10,000 years can give you such a crick in the neck?
\n<Menke>Well yes there’s that! But the last person I granted wishes for wished for the nicest fabrics in the world, and I found a loophole that let me stay here!
\n<Jet>You’re talking about mommy again aren’t you?
\n<Menke>Yes my son, that was your mother. Even though she isn’t here anymore, I can grant her wish by making sure her children have the finest clothes in the world.
\n<Matsuki>(I had no idea.. That’s so sweet of him..)
\n<Menke>Also because the profits are so fantastic!!! The amount of money Drakul will pay for nice fabrics is extraordinary!
\n<Matsuki>Because 10,000 years can give you such a crick in the neck?
\n<Menke>Well yes there’s that! But the last person I granted wishes for wished for the nicest fabrics in the world, and I found a loophole that let me stay here!
\n<Jet>You’re talking about mommy again aren’t you?
\n<Menke>Yes my son, that was your mother. Even though she isn’t here anymore, I can grant her wish by making sure her children have the finest clothes in the world.
\n<Matsuki>(I had no idea.. That’s so sweet of him..)
\n<Menke>Also because the profits are so fantastic!!! The amount of money Drakul will pay for nice fabrics is extraordinary!
\n<Menke>Did you still need to buy something?
\n<Menke>It's nice watching my children play like this. If only I could make money from such contentment.
\n<Shiori>Hello Matsu! I was just on my way to help my grandmother in the shrine.
\n<Shiori>There’s something calming about being in such a holy place. It makes me feel safe.
Like how I feel about you
I'm surprised you won't be a shrine maiden
It makes me feel safe too
Like how I feel about you
\n<Shiori>You make me feel safe too Matsu, ever since we were kids.
\n<Matsuki>I wasn’t all that great back then.. (I put you in danger)
\n<Shiori>Stop its ok we were kids.. Even if we had frightening experiences I still felt safe and trusted you. I’m still proud of the you back then, even if you’re not.
\n<Matsuki>I’ll try to make you proud of me...I’m just still figuring out in which way.
I'm surprised you won't be a shrine maiden
\n<Shiori>I thought I would be for the longest time. I wanted to keep honoring my parents, so they can be proud of me.

\n<Shiori>But still. I thought tending to the shrine and honoring the Gods all my life would protect their spirits more..but grandmother talked to me about it, and I just can’t do that after what she said.
\n<Matsuki>Is everything ok? You never told me about this what did she say?
\n<Shiori>That they weren’t the kind of adults to look back or stay stagnant. That no one gives life with the hope that the one they give it to will waste theirs defying fate.

\n<Shiori>Haha yup! Leave it to grandma to shatter your worldview while still leaving you vaguely confused. But I figure she’s right. I love flowers more than the shrine anyway. I figure a beautiful shop would make them just as proud.
\n<Matsuki>My parents are proud of you too. They aren’t a replacement but... It would make me happy if you thought of them as your parents too.
\n<Matsuki>Ah!! Please don’t cry! That was so insensitive of me to say I’m so sorry Shiori!! No one could ever replace your parents I’m so sorry to imply that!!
\n<Shiori>Haha my silly Matsu, you’re perfect you know that? You always know how to cheer me up. I’m so happy. I love your parents so much it means so much to have you say that.
It makes me feel safe too
\n<Shiori>I would hope it still did! I remember having to wake you up when you would fall asleep!!
\n<Matsuki>I was seven!!! The Gods have already judged me and yet you still continue!!
\n<Shiori>Hahaha you’re so easy to tease Matsu~
\n<Matsuki>I know, that’s why I gave it.
\n<Shiori>I...well then I’ll be sure to cherish it. It’s not everyday a girl receives something from such a wonderful person.
\n<Shiori>You're wonderful Matsu. I hope that never changes..
\n<Shiori>You'd have to at least take me out to dinner first~
\n<Matsuki> (I don't have anything good enough to give Shiori!!!)
\n<Shiori>Such a charmer Matsu~ Are you getting all this bravery because you’re an adult.
\n<Matsuki>no-YES (god this is hard why dont words work???)
\n<Shiori>Well how about on your day of choosing you come my way and make an extra choice, would that work?
\n<Matsuki>(This woman will be the death of me)

\n<Shiori>Hello Matsu! I was just on my way to help my grandmother in the shrine.

Like how I feel about you

I'm surprised you won't be a shrine maiden
\n<Shiori>I thought I would be for the longest time. I wanted to keep honoring my parents, so they can be proud of me.

\n<Shiori>But still. I thought tending to the shrine and honoring the Gods all my life would protect their spirits more..but grandmother talked to me about it, and I just can’t do that after what she said.
\n<Matsuki>Is everything ok? You never told me about this what did she say?
\n<Shiori>That they weren’t the kind of adults to look back or stay stagnant. That no one gives life with the hope that the one they give it to will waste theirs defying fate.

\n<Shiori>Haha yup! Leave it to grandma to shatter your worldview while still leaving you vaguely confused. But I figure she’s right. I love flowers more than the shrine anyway. I figure a beautiful shop would make them just as proud.
\n<Matsuki>My parents are proud of you too. They aren’t a replacement but… It would make me happy if you thought of them as your parents too.
\n<Matsuki>Ah!! Please don’t cry! That was so insensitive of me to say I’m so sorry Shiori!! No one could ever replace your parents I’m so sorry to imply that!!
\n<Shiori>Haha my silly Matsu, you’re perfect you know that? You always know how to cheer me up. I’m so happy. I love your parents so much it means so much to have you say that.
It makes me feel safe too
\n<Shiori>I would hope it still did! I remember having to wake you up when you would fall asleep!!
\n<Matsuki>I was seven!!! The Gods have already judged me and yet you still continue!!
\n<Shiori>Hahaha you’re so easy to tease Matsu~
\n<Matsuki>I know, that’s why I gave it.
\n<Shiori>I...well then I’ll be sure to cherish it. It’s not everyday a girl receives something from such a wonderful person.
\n<Shiori>You're wonderful Matsu. I hope that never changes..
\n<Shiori>You'd have to at least take me out to dinner first~
\n<Matsuki> (I don't have anything good enough to give Shiori!!!)
\n<Shiori>Such a charmer Matsu~ Are you getting all this bravery because you’re an adult.
\n<Matsuki>no-YES (god this is hard why dont words work???)
\n<Shiori>Well how about on your day of choosing you come my way and make an extra choice, would that work?
\n<Matsuki>(This woman will be the death of me)
I plan to go fishing today!
I feel a bit lazy today
I’m doing great now that you’re here
I plan to go fishing today!
\n<Shiori>You are? I heard that sometimes, if you’re really lucky, you can catch a conch shell. I’ve tried before, but I’ve never been lucky enough to catch one.
I feel a bit lazy today
\n<Shiori>ugh me too...I think maybe I’ll help your mom in the tavern for a bit.
\n<Shiori>But wait! You shouldn’t be feeling lazy!! You have a lot to get done Matsu, now isn’t the time to be lazy!!
\n<Shiori>No buts except for your nice one! You're letting me distracting you! Go seize the day Matsu!
I’m doing great now that you’re here
\n<Shiori>Since when have you gotten so good at flirting?
\n<Matsuki>(Since I started saying what I think)
\n<Shiori>Well, sweet flattery or not it’s true for me too, I’ve been so bored today! It’s this strange in between. It’s almost time for your day of choosing, but not close enough to begin preparing…
\n<Matsuki>Well how do you think I feel?
\n<Shiori>Ah!! You’re right Matsu! I’m sorry, you’re the one having to work so hard!

\n<Matsuki>No it’s ok, really. It’s just weird having everyone begging for my time. I miss just helping Jet and Sara catch bugs, or helping Tobi eat a whole cake by ourselves. It just feels so different.
\n<Shiori>Well can’t you do those things as an adult.
\n<Shiori>Well when you’re an adult you get to choose what to do right?
\n<Shiori>Then who is there to stop you from helping Jet and Sara on your days off? Or eating half a cake when you’re done for the day? You’re parents can’t tell you not to?
\n<Matsuki>That's brilliant!!! Shiori you've cracked the code!!!
\n<Matsuki>I know, that’s why I gave it.
\n<Shiori>I...well then I’ll be sure to cherish it. It’s not everyday a girl receives something from such a wonderful person.
\n<Shiori>You're wonderful Matsu. I hope that never changes..
\n<Shiori>You'd have to at least take me out to dinner first~
\n<Matsuki> (I don't have anything good enough to give Shiori!!!)
\n<Shiori>Aren’t you the sweetest woman? I want you to be able to focus on apprenticing though...
